content: Your entire comment D J B is a reaction to what you wrote here: “it is troubling to read how you how your struggle to justify that women should aspire to find a man to protect them.” And yet there is nothing in this article about justifying any relationship aspirations of men. Nor is there anything in this essay about Mike Pence or my relationship status or my relationship desires or even a claim that men and women are equally victimized by violence. Your entire comment has nothing to do with the content my post at all.
